tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I traveled all the way from oman to see dr tejal podar, I was told in oman that I can not conceive. For someone who has been struggling from PCOS and PTSD I grappled  every hour of time. When I entered the clinic I saw a picture that says "nothing is impossible" and that actually happened. When I met Dr tejal she made me understand each thing very briefly, without commenting on my weight or judging me. I will vist her again for IVF after 6 months of treatment which was given by her.. I was head over heels when I got my period without taking any medicine and this happened first time in 4 years. I highly recommend Dr tejal podar she has such an endearing personality no one walks out being downhearted.
reply_text: Thnk you so much for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Experience we had with Little fertility clinic under Dr. Tejal is highly infinitely positive and relaxing as reluctance, doubts and fear we had got cleared the time me and my wife together first visited Dr Tejal. 

she is very approachable, professional, focused, understanding and caring. 

Both me and my wife had so many difficulties deciding which doctor to approach for our beginning and somehow decision we made to be under guidance of Dr Tejal is something we will never regret.

Thank You Dr. Tejal Poddar for being a true hope for us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Labor and Delivery,
review: I found out i was pregnant and was looking for gynaecologists close to home. She had amazing reviews so we went to her for first checkup. We found her to be very patient and liked how she treated each issue and overall, we had a very smooth pregnancy. I recently delivered and post pregnancy also, she has been very helpful. Loved how she was always just a call away, be it day or night! Had a lot of questions which she was very patient to answer throughout the 9 months. Excellent and frank advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
*** ***** ****** *** ******* ****** ** ***** **** ************* ******* *** *** ************ ******** **** *** ******* ** *** ****** ********* *** * **** **** ****** *******She was in a rush and was not paying attention to what exactly i am saying. 
She neither asked basic questions nor asked medical history. 
Consultation happened not more than 5 minutes, for which i paid 1049 rupees.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ***** ** *** ****** **************i came to know abt her via online.she examine patients situation keenly and prescribe accordingly.she is available if you have any quary i can contact her 24\7.she understand & listen problem & will give best suggestion.i highly recommend her to my friends & family members.*** ** *** **** ***** * **** ********
Complete satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),
review:
The doctor is very cooperative,and approachable. I did not feel hesitation to ask any problem around the health concern I visited for.
Definitely recommend to see her in case you have any gynaecology related concerns and be assured of getting the proper treatment to get cured.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She carries her profession like her passion. Very polite, very understanding, non judgemental, gives proper and accurate health advice rather than giving lecture on morality, affordable, convenient and a very nice personality.

No one wish to meet a doctor again but I would like to meet her again for a good cause!
reply_text: Thanks you so much for this feedback

review:
